```bash
[root@controller vagrant]# mkdir secret
[root@controller vagrant]# cd secret
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault create secret-data.yml
New Vault password: 
Confirm New Vault password: 
[root@controller secret]# cat secret-data.yml
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
30663437656238333466313665633964303464656366663035613464323735656464323432383261
6633393139323832353836333538346331393837383139370a643831326265336561653465633630
31623266666633376166346131383737646434656662623962376563643632376161323736633132
6337626237633036390a633166653333363733376636366362653363326430333066343337373331
66633432623064393336316637616362306565396139646465366431626235616238
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault view secret-data.yml
Vault password: 
vmvare_password: poukal
[root@controller secret]# vi secret-data.yml
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault edit secret-data.yml
Vault password: 
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault view secret-data.yml
Vault password: 
vmware_password: poukal
vmware_token: mytoken
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault decrypt secret-data.yml
Vault password: 
Decryption successful
[root@controller secret]# cat secret-data.yml
vmware_password: poukal
vmware_token: mytoken
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault encrypt secret-data.yml
New Vault password: 
Confirm New Vault password: 
Encryption successful
[root@controller secret]# cat secret-data.yml
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256
37656439623061386566383432353961353461333130333137326631386263386137396535373266
3766636239383365313738633339306139343232346365330a353265373534396431346664396466
36393864346466643230616164633936303534343538393033616661326131626635303266333862
3262393762656332310a306264363433666339323737333730376265333737343764393765633738
37313332643837383566323538313736316139303435613731336637376235666561363465616239
3461313935363630653430333234323764336662383338396566
[root@controller secret]# ansible-vault rekey secret-data.yml
Vault password: 
New Vault password: 
Confirm New Vault password: 
Rekey successful
[root@controller secret]# cat secret-data.yml
$ANSIBLE_VAULT;1.1;AES256

[root@controller secret]# 
```
